entry.def: Electrical goods, equipment, or appliances work by means of electricity.
Electrical systems or parts supply or use electricity.
Electrical energy is energy in the form of electricity.

entry.tran: 制造电气设备的;供电的
entry.def: Electrical industries, engineers, or workers are involved in the production and supply of electricity or electrical goods.
